00020             enum CompressionProfile
00021             {
00022                 // compression type
00023                 COMPRESSION_PROFILE_UNCOMPRESSED = 0x00,
00024                 COMPRESSION_PROFILE_LOSSY        = 0x40,
00025                 COMPRESSION_PROFILE_LOSSLESS     = 0x80,
00026                 COMPRESSION_PROFILE_TYPE_MASK    = COMPRESSION_PROFILE_LOSSY | COMPRESSION_PROFILE_LOSSLESS,
00027                 
00028 
00029                 // compression time
00030                 COMPRESSION_PROFILE_REALTIME     = 0x8,
00031                 COMPRESSION_PROFILE_GOOD_QUALITY = 0x10,
00032                 COMPRESSION_PROFILE_BEST_QUALITY = 0x18,
00033                 COMPRESSION_PROFILE_TIME_MASK    = COMPRESSION_PROFILE_REALTIME | COMPRESSION_PROFILE_GOOD_QUALITY | COMPRESSION_PROFILE_BEST_QUALITY,
00034 
00035                 COMPRESSION_PROFILE_LOSSLESS_REALTIME = COMPRESSION_PROFILE_LOSSLESS | COMPRESSION_PROFILE_REALTIME,
00036                 COMPRESSION_PROFILE_LOSSY_REALTIME    = COMPRESSION_PROFILE_LOSSY | COMPRESSION_PROFILE_REALTIME,
00037 
00038             };
